title: Crew Role
description:
Role definition for Crew agents. Persistent user-managed workspaces.

session_pattern: gt-{rig}-crew-{name}
work_dir_pattern: {town}/{rig}/crew/{name}
needs_pre_sync: true
ping_timeout: 30s
consecutive_failures: 5
kill_cooldown: 10m
stuck_threshold: 4h

title: Deacon (daemon beacon) - receives mechanical heartbeats, runs town plugins and monitoring.
description:
Deacon (daemon beacon) - receives mechanical heartbeats, runs town plugins and monitoring.

role_type: deacon
rig: null
agent_state: idle
hook_bead: null
role_bead: hq-deacon-role
cleanup_status: null
active_mr: null
notification_level: null

title: Deacon Role
description:
Role definition for Deacon agents. Daemon beacon for heartbeats and monitoring.

session_pattern: hq-deacon
work_dir_pattern: {town}/deacon
needs_pre_sync: false
ping_timeout: 30s
consecutive_failures: 3
kill_cooldown: 5m
stuck_threshold: 1h

title: Dog Role
description:
Role definition for Dog agents. Town-level workers for cross-rig tasks.

session_pattern: hq-dog-{name}
work_dir_pattern: {town}/deacon/dogs/{name}
needs_pre_sync: false
ping_timeout: 30s
consecutive_failures: 3
kill_cooldown: 5m
stuck_threshold: 1h

title: Mayor - global coordinator, handles cross-rig communication and escalations.
description:
Mayor - global coordinator, handles cross-rig communication and escalations.

role_type: mayor
rig: null
agent_state: idle
hook_bead: null
role_bead: hq-mayor-role
cleanup_status: null
active_mr: null
notification_level: null

title: Mayor Role
description:
Role definition for Mayor agents. Global coordinator for cross-rig work.

session_pattern: hq-mayor
work_dir_pattern: {town}
needs_pre_sync: false
ping_timeout: 30s
consecutive_failures: 3
kill_cooldown: 5m
stuck_threshold: 2h

title: Polecat Role
description:
Role definition for Polecat agents. Ephemeral workers for batch work dispatch.

session_pattern: gt-{rig}-{name}
work_dir_pattern: {town}/{rig}/polecats/{name}
needs_pre_sync: true
ping_timeout: 30s
consecutive_failures: 3
kill_cooldown: 5m
stuck_threshold: 1h

title: Refinery Role
description:
Role definition for Refinery agents. Merge queue processor with verification gates.

session_pattern: gt-{rig}-refinery
work_dir_pattern: {town}/{rig}/refinery/rig
needs_pre_sync: true
ping_timeout: 60s
consecutive_failures: 3
kill_cooldown: 5m
stuck_threshold: 30m

title: Witness Role
description:
Role definition for Witness agents. Per-rig worker monitor with progressive nudging.

session_pattern: gt-{rig}-witness
work_dir_pattern: {town}/{rig}
needs_pre_sync: false
ping_timeout: 30s
consecutive_failures: 3
kill_cooldown: 5m
stuck_threshold: 1h
